Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 35th
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 35th due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 35th due to a sick customer.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#24 Wentworth

#29 State

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
